document.full_text: an influential member of germany's governing coalition backed the possibility on tuesday of easing the terms of greece's euro zone bailout, a move that might help athens better weather the debt crisis.
document.title: year after greek bailout, eu ponders rejigged package
lines_and_colors: an influential member of germany's governing coalition backed the possibility on tuesday of easing the terms of greece's euro zone bailout, a move that might help athens better weather the debt crisis.
